title: Admin Console Access
test_description: Validate admin console access via SCIM API
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const scimStep = stepResults.test_scim_access; if (!scimStep) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from SCIM API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access' }; } const statusCode = scimStep.status; const apiOutput = scimStep.data; if (apiOutput && apiOutput.Resources && statusCode === 200) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Admin console access verified', code: 'ACCESS_VERIFIED', test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access' }; } if (statusCode === 403) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Admin console properly secured', code: 'ACCESS_RESTRICTED', test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access' }; } if (statusCode === 401) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Authentication failed for admin console', code: 'AUTHENTICATION_FAILED', test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access' }; } return { status: 'fail', message: 'Unexpected response from admin console: ' + statusCode, code: 'HTTP_' + statusCode, test_id: 'IQ-101-3', title: 'Admin Console Access' }; }
